sub-events.comment: grab the iid of each piece present

events.comment: Initialize after state has been loaded

sub-events.comment: logic for placing a piece: when a piece is selected pick a random one that the mouse clicks on (used if there are multiple overtop eachother)
if the piece is sideways, move it based on Y , X
if the piece is not sideways move it based on X , Y
if the player properly places a piece, place it and give them a +1
if the user drops a piece not over the drop zone reset it

events.comment: if the piece they drop collides with any of the following, do a special condition
IVAN COMMENT: THIS IS WHERE CLOTHES ARE "DESTROYED"

sub-events.comment: if a piece reaches the truck, destroy and subtract score
